title: Joe Ralls: Cardiff City captain’s future in doubt with injury
title_page: Joe Ralls: Cardiff City captain’s future in doubt with injury - BBC Sport
maintext:
Cardiff City captain Joe Ralls might have played his final game for the club after sustaining an injury that could rule him out for the rest of the season.
The 31-year-old midfielder missed Saturday's 1-1 Championship draw against Sheffield Wednesday with a calf problem, which could keep him sidelined for a month.
And with his contract expiring at the end of this season, Ralls' 15-year association with Cardiff could come to an end this summer.
"He hurt his calf so he'll be out for three or four weeks. He probably won't feature again this season," said Bluebirds manager Omer Riza.
